name: BOWListic!
description:
BOWListic! by Chandler Smith, with a good amount of pickle jars by Clayton Cowden.

Do you need to take a break and just throw whatever you can find down a bowling lane? Well even if you don't that's what you're getting in BOWListic! Fling not only bowling balls, but Golf Clubs, Bombs, Pins, and more in an attempt to take out as many pins as possible for the highest score.

This game was developed for Brackeys Jam 2021.2, however make sure to check back in later as I hope to improve and add a few things in the future!
